article_title: Employers advised to review employee handbooks for ACA compliance
article_text:
Even though the Affordable Care Act’s employer mandate is in effect, few employers have updated their employee handbooks to reflect the ACA. Here are some ways employers may bolster their ACA compliance—and avoid ACA penalties—through an ACA-focused employee handbook review.

While employers are undoubtedly already fatigued by ACA compliance, there are several reasons to take on this exercise.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Patricia A. Moran
article_metadata.description: Often overlooked, handbooks are an important form of documentation that the IRS or DOL will most likely request during an audit, says attorney Patricia Moran.
